languages.text: У коммуникационной станции Вольный Торговец сталкивается с Мастером вокса. "Слава Императору, вы целы, Лорд-капитан! Докладываю: ситуация на борту удовлетворительная. Я как раз пытаюсь настроить каналы связи — скоро все вокс-передатчики заработают в полную силу".

traits.locale_text: У коммуникационной станции Вольный Торговец сталкивается с Мастером Вокса. "Слава Императору вы целы, Лорд-капитан! Ситуация на корабле потихоньку стабилизируется. А я как раз пытаюсь настроить каналы связи. Скоро все вокс-передатчики снова заработают".

languages.text: By the comm station, the Rogue Trader runs into the Vox Master. "Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece, Lord Captain! The situation on board is satisfactory. I was just in the middle of setting up comm channels — soon all the vox-casters will be fully operational."
languages.original_text: У коммуникационной станции Вольный Торговец сталкивается с Мастером вокса. "Слава Императору, вы целы, Лорд-капитан! Докладываю: ситуация на борту удовлетворительная. Я как раз пытаюсь настроить каналы связи — скоро все вокс-передатчики заработают в полную силу".

traits.locale_text: By the comm station, the Rogue Trader runs into the Vox Master. "Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece, Lord Captain! Reporting: the situation on board is satisfactory. I was just in the middle of setting up comm channels — soon all the vox-transmitters will be fully operational."

By the comm station, the Rogue Trader runs into the Vox Master. "Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece, Lord Captain! Reporting: the situation on board is satisfactory. I was just in the middle of setting up comm channels — soon all the vox-transmitters will be fully operational."

By the comm station, the Rogue Trader runs into the Vox Master. "Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece, Lord Captain! The situation on board is satisfactory. I was just in the middle of setting up comm channels — soon all the vox-casters will be fully operational."

By the comm station, the Rogue Trader runs into the Vox Master. "Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece, Lord Captain! The situation on board is satisfactory. I was just in the middle of setting up comm channels — soon all the vox-casters will be fully operational."

By the comm station, the Rogue Trader runs into the Vox Master. "Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece, Lord Captain! The situation on board is satisfactory. I was just in the middle of setting up comm channels — soon all the vox-casters will be fully operational."

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente se cruza con la maestra de vocos junto al puesto de comunicaciones. «Alabado sea el Emperador, ¡sigue de una pieza, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}! La situación a bordo es aceptable. Estaba preparando los canales de comunicación. Los voco amplificadores pronto estarán listos».
languages.original_text: By the comm station, the Rogue Trader runs into the Vox Master. "Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece, Lord Captain! The situation on board is satisfactory. I was just in the middle of setting up comm channels — soon all the vox-casters will be fully operational."

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente se cruza con la maestra de vocos junto al puesto de comunicaciones. «Alabado sea el Emperador, ¡sigue de una pieza, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}! La situación a bordo es aceptable. Estaba preparando los canales de comunicación. Los voco amplificadores pronto estarán listos».

languages.text: 行商浪人在音阵站旁遇到了音阵大师。“赞美帝皇，您平安无事，舰长大人！船上的情况很令人满意。我刚刚正在设置音阵频道，用不了多久，所有的通讯器就又可以正常使用了。”
languages.original_text: By the comm station, the Rogue Trader runs into the Vox Master. "Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece, Lord Captain! The situation on board is satisfactory. I was just in the middle of setting up comm channels — soon all the vox-casters will be fully operational."

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人在音阵站旁遇到了音阵大师。“赞美帝皇，您平安无事，舰长大人！船上的情况很令人满意。我刚刚正在设置音阵频道，用不了多久，所有的通讯器就又可以正常使用了。”

languages.text: 通信ステーションのそばで、自由開拓者はヴォクス・マスターに遭遇した。「皇帝を讃えよ。ロード・キャプテン、ご無事だったのですね！船内の状況は申し分ありません。ちょうど通信チャンネルを設定しているところでして、すぐに全ての音声通信送受信装置が完全に稼働するでしょう」
languages.original_text: By the comm station, the Rogue Trader runs into the Vox Master. "Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece, Lord Captain! The situation on board is satisfactory. I was just in the middle of setting up comm channels — soon all the vox-casters will be fully operational."

traits.locale_text: 通信ステーションのそばで、自由開拓者はヴォクス・マスターに遭遇した。「皇帝を讃えよ。ロード・キャプテン、ご無事だったのですね！船内の状況は申し分ありません。ちょうど通信チャンネルを設定しているところでして、すぐに全ての音声通信送受信装置が完全に稼働するでしょう」

languages.text: An der Kommunikationsstation trifft {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} auf die Voxmeisterin. "Gelobt sei der Imperator, Ihr seid unversehrt, Lord Captain! Die Situation an Bord ist zufriedenstellend. Ich war gerade dabei, die Kommunikationskanäle einzurichten – bald werden alle Vox-Caster voll einsatzbereit sein."
languages.original_text: By the comm station, the Rogue Trader runs into the Vox Master. "Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece, Lord Captain! The situation on board is satisfactory. I was just in the middle of setting up comm channels — soon all the vox-casters will be fully operational."

languages.text: Près du poste de communication, {name} tombe sur la maîtresse-vox. « Loué soit l'Empereur, vous êtes indemne, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! La situation à bord est satisfaisante. J'étais en train de rétablir les canaux de communications. Bientôt, tous les émetteurs vox seront totalement opérationnels. »
languages.original_text: By the comm station, the Rogue Trader runs into the Vox Master. "Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece, Lord Captain! The situation on board is satisfactory. I was just in the middle of setting up comm channels — soon all the vox-casters will be fully operational."

traits.locale_text: Près du poste de communication, {name} tombe sur la maîtresse-vox. « Loué soit l'Empereur, vous êtes indemne, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! La situation à bord est satisfaisante. J'étais en train de rétablir les canaux de communications. Bientôt, tous les émetteurs-vox seront totalement opérationnels. »

languages.text: Hür Tacir, iletişim istasyonunun yanında Voks Üstadı'na rastlıyor. "İmparator'a şükürler olsun bir şeyiniz yok Lord Kaptan! Gemideki durum makbul seviyede. Ben de tam iletişim kanallarını kuruyordum, yakında tüm voksyayarlar faaliyete geçecek."
languages.original_text: By the comm station, the Rogue Trader runs into the Vox Master. "Praise the Emperor, you're in one piece, Lord Captain! The situation on board is satisfactory. I was just in the middle of setting up comm channels — soon all the vox-casters will be fully operational."

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir, iletişim istasyonunun yanında Voks Üstadı'na rastlıyor. "İmparator'a şükürler olsun bir şeyiniz yok Lord Kaptan! Gemideki durum makbul seviyede. Ben de tam iletişim kanallarını kuruyordum, yakında tüm voksyayarlar faaliyete geçecek."
